wikipedia_page.main: Aqeel Ahmed (born 28 July 1992) is an amateur boxer from Dundee, Scotland. He represented Scotland in the Commonwealth Games in Glasgow in 2014 and again in Gold Coast in 2018. He is the current British Champion 2016, having defended it from the previous year.In May 2019, Ahmed was selected to compete at the 2019 European Games in Minsk, Belarus.
